Properties.name: GPIO
Properties.desc: This unit is used to provide input or output functionality

property.name: Mode_of_operation
property.desc: select one of the mode mentioned below 1. Analog 2. Input pull-down 3. Input pull-up 4. Input floating 5. Output open-drain 6. Output push-pull 7. Alternate function open-drain 8. Alternate function push-pull

property.name: PIN_NO
property.desc: select input/ouput Pin number for specified operation e.g PA1 for LCD_Backlight,PA$ for DAC1 output

property.name: output_speed
property.desc: configure output speed of operation NOTE:for reasons of power consumption and noise, it is desirable to use the lowest speed consistent with the I/O requirements.
